ProjectTitle: ‘Successful’ Women of the Transnational Field: Gender and Social Mobility among Sierra Leonean Women in Europe
InitialFeedbackHistory:
08/06/2023
It would be best to do an update of the DMP when your PRET has been written, submitted and approved, so you can include more details on the security of handling, storing, transferring your various types of research data. Indicate in your PRET where data are collected (interviews, photographs, video).  In Europe? Outside Europe?. How such personal data are captured, then transferred to KU Leuven storage. Whether or not you keep interview recordings after transcription, etc. It's best to distinguish the storage, preservation and sharing of the raw personal data (handled under GDPR), versus pseudonymised / anonymised data such are your coding. 
Guidance on data management for interviews here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/rdm-data-types/interview-data
label: not good
